1.text: Make a clock face. Practise telling the time.
1.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Make a clock face. Practise telling the time.</prosody></speak>

3.text: • Paste some word cards on the board. Read the words. Divide the students into five groups. Ask them to form lines facing the blackboard. Whisper a word to the last student in each line. Ask him/her to whisper the word to the student in front of him/ her. Continue till the word comes to the first pupil. Ask the student in front to run to the board and take the word card. Ask him/ her to run to the end of the line. Continue the game.
3.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>• Paste some word cards on the board. Read the words. Divide the students into five groups. Ask them to form lines facing the blackboard. Whisper a word to the last student in each line. Ask him/her to whisper the word to the student in front of him/ her. Continue till the word comes to the first pupil. Ask the student in front to run to the board and take the word card. Ask him/ her to run to the end of the line. Continue the game.</prosody></speak>

4.text: • Practise |e| short vowel sound with the students using the following words. above, ahead, about, agree, around, alone, arrive, apartment, again, etc.
4.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>• Practise |e| short vowel sound with the students using the following words. above, ahead, about, agree, around, alone, arrive, apartment, again, etc.</prosody></speak>
